name: Kodiak Fernie Waterproof SaltShield Insulated Boots - Women's
description: Retro lines and urban style, ready for city winters. At first glance, the Fernie look like a vintage hiking boot, but look closer and you'll appreciate the stitch detailing and rich leather construction. Waterproof SaltShield™ leather means you won’t have to hop over piles of salt or puddles of snowmelt to protect your boots. While the waterproof leather and Thinsulate™ insulation keep your feet warm and dry.Waterproof SaltShield leather repels damage salt can cause, simply brush off salt stains, without discoloration or damage.Lined with a waterproof breathable membrane, your feet can breathe while staying dry.200 grams of Thinsulate™ synthetic insulation light and efficient.Soft microfibre lining is warm and wicks away moisture.Leather and memory foam insole contours comfortably to your foot and is removable should you want to add your own insole.EVA heel absorbs impacts and offers all-day support.Grippy rubber tread provides great traction.
